properties.areaDesc: Pickens, AL; Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 5 at 8:03AM CST until January 7 at 4:48AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam...

.Water levels remain in flood stage but continue to fall on the Tombigbee
River at Bevill Lock and Dam and at Gainesville Lock and Dam... The Tombigbee
River continues to rise at Demopolis Lock and Dam and will crest just below
moderate flood stage on Tuesday.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam.
* until late Monday night...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  6:00 AM Sunday the stage was 127.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 122 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
tomorrow afternoon .
* Impact...At 122 feet...Cattle in low-lying areas of Southern
Pickens County should be moved to higher ground. Cattle are cutoff
in lowlands of Southern Pickens County at stages above 122 feet.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
